A circle with center $ O$ has area $ 156\pi$.  Triangle $ ABC$ is equilateral, $ \overline{BC}$ is a chord on the circle, $ OA = 4\sqrt3$, and point $ O$ is outside $ \triangle ABC$.  What is the side length of $ \triangle ABC$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2\sqrt3 \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 6 \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 4\sqrt3 \qquad\textbf{(D)}\ 12 \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ 18$
